lines.text: Ah, there's nothing like the sight of a Spearow in flight!
I wish I'd remembered to bring some bird seed!
The nesting habits of the red-crested Pidgeot are remarkably similar to those of the tawny Hoothoot.
It is such an interesting thing to observe bird Pokémon! You should try it sometime.
Sometimes I have to hide for weeks in the forest just to spot one Noctowl.
It gets a bit uncomfortable, sleeping on the ground. Oh well, someone has to do it!
My job is very important, you know! I provide all the information on bird Pokémon that you need to train them.
Yes, the poor ornithologist is an unsung hero in the field of Pokémon research.
Pardon me, do you have any bread? I've run out of bird seed to tempt Starly with.
My binoculars are the strongest available. I can spot a pygmy Starly from ten miles away!
